Hello blank fragment
I don\'t feel upset or sad.
I\'m upset.
I\'m always upset and can\'t switch off.
I\'m so upset and unhappy that I can\'t bear it.
I\'m not worried about my future.
I feel concerned about the future.
I feel that nothing awaits me in the future.
My future is hopeless, and nothing can change for the better.
I don\'t feel like a failure.
I feel like I\'ve endured more failures than other people.
When I look back at my life, I see a lot of failures in it.
I feel like as a person I\'m a complete failure.
I derive as much satisfaction from life as before.
I don\'t derive as much satisfaction from life as before.
I no longer derive satisfaction from anything.
I\'m completely dissatisfied with life, and everything has become tedious to me.
I don\'t feel guilty about anything.
I feel guilty quite often.
Most of the time, I feel guilty.
I constantly experience a sense of guilt.
I don\'t feel that I could be punished for anything.
I feel that I could be punished.
I expect that I could be punished.
I feel as though I\'ve already been punished.
I\'ve never thought about ending my life.
Thoughts of ending my life come to me, but I won\'t act on them.
I\'d like to end my life.
I\'d kill myself if the opportunity presented itself.
I don\'t cry any more than usual.
I cry more often now than before.
Now, I cry all the time.
Before, I could cry, but now I can\'t even if I want to.
I don\'t think about ending my life
I have thoughts of killing myself, but I won\'t do it
I would like to kill myself
I would kill myself if I had the chance
I cry no more than usual
I cry more often than before
Now I cry all the time
I used to be able to cry, but now I can\\\'t even if I want to
I am no more irritable than usual
I am more irritable than usual
I feel constantly irritable
I am indifferent to things that used to irritate me
I have not lost interest in other people
I am less interested in other people than before
I have almost lost interest in other people
I have completely lost interest in other people
I delay making decisions sometimes, like before
I postpone making decisions more often than before
It is harder for me to make decisions than before
I cannot make any decisions anymore
I do not feel that I look worse than usual
I am worried that I look old and unattractive
I know that there have been significant changes in my appearance that make me unattractive
I know that I look ugly.
I can work just as well as before
I need to make an extra effort to start doing something
I find it difficult to make myself do anything
I cannot perform any work at all
I sleep just as well as before
Now I sleep worse than before
I wake up 1–2 hours earlier, and it\'s hard for me to fall asleep again
I wake up several hours earlier than usual and cannot fall asleep anymore
I am no more tired than usual
Now I get tired faster than before
I get tired from almost everything I do
I cannot do anything due to fatigue
My appetite is no worse than usual
My appetite has worsened compared to before
My appetite is now significantly worse
I have no appetite at all
I am not more concerned about my health than usual
I am worried about problems with my physical health, such as pain, stomach upset, constipation, etc.
I am very concerned about my physical state…
I am so worried about my physical condition that I can\'t think about anything else
Lately, I have not noticed any changes in my interest in sex.
I am less concerned about sexual issues than before.
I am significantly less interested in sexual problems than before.
I have completely lost my sexual interest.

Stage 1: Absence of Depressive Symptoms - Individuals in this stage are not experiencing any depressive symptoms. They may be feeling positive, energetic, and motivated. Recommended actions include maintaining a healthy lifestyle, developing positive coping strategies, and engaging in activities that promote a sense of well-being.

Stage 2: Moderate Depression - At this stage, individuals may experience a decrease in appetite, difficulty sleeping, and may withdraw from social activities. They may also have negative thoughts and feelings of hopelessness. Recommended action: Encourage the user to seek professional help and consider using cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) techniques through the app.

Stage 3: Moderate Depression - Individuals in this stage experience more significant symptoms of depression, such as difficulty sleeping, changes in appetite, and feelings of worthlessness. Recommended actions include seeking professional help, such as therapy or medication, developing a strong support system, and practicing self-compassion.

Stage 4: Moderate to Severe Depression - Individuals in this stage experience severe symptoms of depression, such as persistent sadness, insomnia, and suicidal thoughts. Recommended actions include seeking professional help immediately, practicing self-care behaviors like regular exercise and healthy eating, and developing a strong support system.

Stage 5: Severe Depression - Individuals in this stage experience the most severe symptoms of depression, such as intense feelings of despair, loss of appetite, and difficulty functioning. Recommended actions include seeking immediate professional help, such as hospitalization or intensive outpatient treatment, practicing self-care behaviors like getting enough sleep and eating well, and engaging in activities that provide a sense of pleasure or accomplishment.
take a test

Welcome! This app is designed to help you assess your symptoms of depression in a quick and easy way. Our depression test can be a useful tool to help you understand your emotional state but it cannot replace a specialist!
Choose the statement that is best suited to you
